member.name: M:System.Reflection.MemberInfoExtensions.HasMetadataToken(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Determines if there is a metadata token available for the given member. throws otherwise.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.MemberInfoExtensions.GetMetadataToken(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Gets a metadata token for the given member if available. The returned token is never nil.
member.exception: There is no metadata token available. returns false in this case.

member.name: P:System.SR.NoMetadataTokenAvailable
member.summary: There is no metadata token available for the given member.

member.name: P:System.SR.PlatformNotSupported_ReflectionTypeExtensions
member.summary: System.Reflection.TypeExtensions is not supported on NET Standard 1.3 or 1.5.
